attributes.action: put in place a prevention plan to ensure that Omar Bin Laden and family do not gain entry into any British land.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
IMMEDIATE ACTION NEEDED
This petition is being raised to bring about awareness and most importantly request a BAN on any of the Bin Laden family from gaining British citizenship, entry into or residency within any British land in light of current news reports of Omar Bin Laden marrying a British woman in Egypt and now seeking entry to Britain.
